description:
Lance Hart is a Hopeless foot fetishist and gets more than he bargains for when spilling his guts to his hot psychiatrist Maitresse Madeline Marlowe’s couch. His desperate desires for FEET lead him to strike a deal with the devil herself!

With the help of her insatiable minions (Daisy Ducati and Mona Wales) Madeline indulges Lance’s every foot fantasy with shoe and stocking worship, toe sniffing and licking, hot foot-focused fucking and a foot job that renders Lance helpless to the magic of feet!

Don’t miss this sexy and evil Halloween Foot Worship Special!
title: Kink Halloween Classic: A Soul for a Sole
